Hi Travis,

Thanks for your upadte, is this configuration relevant on Herit=
rix 1.14.4?
And I didn't found in the web UI the added extractor :  Extract=
orImpliedURI-YoutubeEmbedded to put the following config :

<object name=3D=
"ExtractorImpliedURI-YoutubeWatchPage">
    <boolean name=3D"enabled">true<=
/boolean>
    <string name=3D"trigger-regexp">^(</string>
    <string name=
=3D"build-pattern">$1/videoplayback?$2</string>
  </object>
